name: Pagination Rel Meta
author: Beau Dierman

sections.description: This plugin adds the rel next and previous meta tags for your paginated pages. Using rel next and previous meta tags will help Google understand your pagination and remove the need for you to noindex anything after the first page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘rel-meta-tags’ directory to your ‘wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Added requirement that will only allow the meta tags to appear on archive pages that paginate.
  • Added license file and readme.txt for submission to the wordpress.org plugin repository

= 0.5 –
* Plugin created, added basic code to supply meta tags for rel next and previous.

short_description: Add rel next and previous tags to paginated pages.
description: This plugin adds the rel next and previous meta tags for your paginated pages. Using rel next and previous meta tags will help Google understand your pagination and remove the need for you to noindex anything after the first page.
